lines.text: Well, what about after the robbery?
You don't think having just robbed a bank is good enough?
Hey, did they ask you about him in the lie detector test?
Oh, yeah, they were trying to be so cute, you know. Asking me questions like have I ever been promiscuous. You know, I don't even know what that means.
Shut up. He's my little brother, okay? He don't have to want nothin'.

[to Frank]
So what do you want?
